about.name: About
about.searchDecs: Search for deals by store name, area, region, category.

contact.name: Contact
contact.description1: is a website that provides information about promotions, discounts, and offers across various sectors of goods and businesses. It helps people searching for discounts find the places they desire to go and discover unexpected deals. It provides additional choices for users to optimize costs and explore new places while gaining access to new products and services. The products will be updated throughout Vietnam to allow customers to travel with confidence and explore safely.
contact.description2: is also a technology platform and a trusted partner for individuals and businesses operating in various industries in terms of communication, market research based on big data online, and provides a platform for product promotion, grand openings, and marketing in the field they own.
contact.description3: For businesses and manufacturers who have not had many tools and conditions to reach customers, we are here and ready to accompany you to easily access potential users.
contact.subtitle1: Communication services on the website platform
contact.subtitle3: Reaching tourists with a multilingual system
contact.subtitle4: Step by step AI application to help users determine their preferences in order to provide AI recommendations for product selection and travel destinations in the supply system (to be implemented)
contact.thanks: Thank you for using our services!
